name: Benegryph Goodvalor's Officer Cap
description:
The hat worn by the "famous Republic war hero" Benegryph Goodvalor. Goodvalor of course was the infamous Snivvian Marn Heirogryph, who was famous in the latter parts of the Mandalorian War for his pro-Republic propaganda and constant tricks he played on the Mandalorians.

When wearing this hat, your Charisma score becomes 19. In addition, you have advantage on all Charisma checks and saving throws.
